website_summaries.verdict: High-quality, reputable herbal formula to support thyroid function.
pros: Glowing results reported in weight loss and increase in energy
Some customers experienced blood-test proven improvement in their thyroid levels from use
cons: Does not contain vitamins and minerals typical in competing thyroid support supplements

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works incredible! I had been taking Levothyroxine for 2 years, and I tried this product a month ago, it worked so well that now I stopped taking the hormone and I feel even better than before! I never felt with more energy, and I my latest blood-work thyroid results showed everything normal! Can't be more thankful. Yes guys, this product works!
customer_reviews.author: montecarlostar

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I am borderline having a thyroid problem, so not really ready for meds but tried meds for a few months until that doc moved on. But then I ran out of the meds. I was instantly battling my weight and energy for months after and knew I needed to try something. I found this on Amazon and gave it a try and honestly, it has helped me safely over the past 6 months or less, lose 25+lbs. It feels nice being able to fit in my clothes again. I honestly believe this has been my miracle helper that I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My primary care physician told me that I was low normal. I was feeling very run down and sluggish and after researching decided to this try product. In looking back at my pictures before this product, I noticed that I appeased puffy. Now that I have been taking this product for over a year, the difference in my appearance and how I feel is nothing short of incredible. I feel a lot better and have a lot more energy.
customer_reviews.author: SherrieG

customer_reviews.title: And I feel so much better.
customer_reviews.text: Prior to taking this, I didn't believe any supplement could have such a noticeable difference. Now I'm clear that when you take what your body needs, you feel the difference. I eat as many fruits and vegetables daily and don't eat dairy, gluten corn or soy. My diet plus this supplement is why I'm off thyroid medication. And I feel so much better.
customer_reviews.author: JEMP

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my Hoshimotos
customer_reviews.text: I have Hoshimotos and swear by this supplement. I have used it for over five years and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie11

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good! Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Finally received my blood test results today and my Dr. mentioned that my Thyroid was back to normal so I won't have to take Thyroid medicine. My Dr. asked me if I was taking the Thyroid Support pills, and I was happy to say YES. So I am going to buy my second bottle and will continue to take. My next follow-up will be next year with my annual physical. YEAH!
customer_reviews.author: Doris L. S

customer_reviews.title: Energy in a bottle:)
customer_reviews.text: This, along with their 'adrenal support' really helps my energy level. I'm a very low key person, who takes meds which make me sleepy, and there's a noticeable difference when I take this. I love that it's cruelty free-won't buy any other.
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: When I found out I had Hashimotos recently I immediately turned to Gaia and have been very happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: Gaia is one of the only brands of supplements I can actually trust. When I found out I had Hashimotos recently I immediately turned to Gaia and have been very happy with the results. I take 2 pills in the morning and 1 at night. They don't unsettle my stomach and go down easy enough. I have found since taking them my mood and energy have greatly improved. Thanks Gaia!
customer_reviews.author: Nicia Z

customer_reviews.title: Hashimotos helper
customer_reviews.text: I have hashimotos, but with this great product, I'm RX free. If I run out, I can feel the palpitations start back up. Great stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: anniebb

customer_reviews.title: Consistent thyroid levels
customer_reviews.text: My doctor and I couldn't get my thyroid steady with just 97.5MG of nature-throid. I take two of this in the morning and one in the evening. Seems to keep my levels steady which makes me feel human again! Also helps with stress because of the ashwaganda in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lavier

customer_reviews.title: This has been the best thyroid supplement I have tried
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best thyroid supplement I have tried. Energy levels are up, hair and skin are are so much better. Lot less hair fall out and no more itchy skin. No side effects and I can take it without food. I will be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: FW

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: I have spent ten years trying to figure out why i felt down right horrible, exhausted, difficult to loose weight and I happened upon this supplement. It has completely changed my life. It solved what doctors could not. I feel nearly normal for the first time in years, I can actually do daily activities and have the energy to exercise! I had what the doctors claimed was perfect thyroid tests, yet I had goiter in the my thyroid. That has now completely disappeared. I love This and wouldn’t ever do without it!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Mia

customer_reviews.title: Gives me more energy
customer_reviews.text: It gives me more energy and keeps depression down also. Does help with some weight control, but more concerned about my energy level.
customer_reviews.author: BETTY TURNER

customer_reviews.title: like found in walnuts
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I was trying to figure out my thyroid. My labs were normal, but I had a lot of hypothyroid symptoms. I started taking these. BE CAREFUL! This supplement has iodine! I don't know how that escaped my attention! You don't want to be taking any iodine supplements without talking to your doctor. Even small amounts of iodine, like found in walnuts, can cahnge the balance of your thyroid hormones drastically. I talked to a physician, a nutritioninst, and I stopped taking these immediately, after I had a very unplesant evening of racing heart palpitations. I don't know if this supplement is what caused it, but don't take iodine supplements on your own.
customer_reviews.author: TaskMe

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders for hypothyroidism
customer_reviews.text: I took this and a thyroid glandular and had my hypothyroidism straightened out naturally in about 6 months rather than going on a life long medication. Absolutely worth it, and a great product. Love gaia anything.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Woodard

customer_reviews.title: This brought my thyroid levels to good range. Felt better within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Blood test verified. This brought my thyroid levels to good range. Felt better within 2 weeks. I've been taking it for about 6 months and always will. I was having "hypo" symptoms and my blood tests were high normal but on edge. Gave this a try and in 3 months my levels were in perfect range. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Breton

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended by my doctor
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my doctor. It is working. I am so excited I am able to take this instead of a prescription.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Made me tired and gained weight  :(
customer_reviews.text: I normally like Gaia supplements but not this one. I read the reviews and thought it might help my hypothyroidism but after taking half the bottle (30 pills) over the course of about 3 weeks I felt awful...super tired AND gained about 5 pounds! And that was at the same time as upping my cardio and cutting out cream in my morning coffee! Plus I suspect it messed with my hormones...I just don't think ashwagandha agrees with me personally. This might be helpful to some but definitely made me feel worse. Stopped taking it four days ago and already down a pound...thank God. Bummed, really wanted it to work. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jen P.

customer_reviews.title: Felt a difference fast!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been struggling with fatigue and weight gain because of my hypothyroidism, these amazing supplements have made a different after a short few days! I won’t ever stop using them!
customer_reviews.author: JG Torres

customer_reviews.title: Super product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! Helps me with concentration, weight management, hair loss and so much more.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This has helped me so much with brain clarity, focus, memory, energy, hair regrowth, joint pain and has prevented me from regaining weight that I lost. I will never be without. *update* SERIOUSLY OVER PACKED!!!! I deducted a star for that. 2 bottles would have fit perfectly with space for packing paper inside 1 of the smaller boxes but each came in their own box inside a giant box! See picture

customer_reviews.title: this is my first bottle
customer_reviews.text: It helps with loosing weight, and you will also get a better night sleep
customer_reviews.author: veronica kouba

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product would help with energy level, weight issues, and other problems associated with thyroid disease but i did not notice any changes at all. I took it every morning for over a month and nothing! Maybe it takes more time to get the benefits of this product but i would think after a month i would notice some change, especially with energy. I would not recommend this product to anyone unless they have the patience to wait longer than a month to see if there are any changes. Just not for me !!!
customer_reviews.author: Liana Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: After taking pills for a couple days I noticed they weren’t working as they used to, checked the ingredients and dosage on my bottle and they were different than why is advertised on the item listing photos.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for ovarian cysts
customer_reviews.text: I had been testing slightly hypo, anemic and also having terrible long periods. These supplements have helped amazingly with my ovarian cysts. I had the lightest no pain period id ever had after taking a month. I finished a bottle, stopped.. And 2 months later had a terrible period again, so ordered again and will continue to take. My energy was better. Also, anemia can cause the thyroid to go wonky too and all those low evergy symptoms. My pcp was helpful with getting labs done but they said my numbers were close enough to normal and didn't follow up... Even though I felt really off. Glad I found these
customer_reviews.author: JMo

customer_reviews.title: I suspected a sluggish thyroid
customer_reviews.text: I was feeling tired all the time as well as having problems losing weight. Even though all my blood work came back within normal limits, I knew the thyroid testing I had done wasn't very extensive. After trying these, I found that I have an increase in energy and I've lost a few pounds as well. That being said, I always recommend seeing your G.P. for bloodwork and to make sure that this won't interfere with any prescription medication that you may currently be on even though this is an herbal supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne M. Pickering

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to anyone having T3 & T4 issues
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to anyone having T3 & T4 issues. I'm hoping with this supplement and the Adrenal health to get off of thyroid medicine.

customer_reviews.text: I was tired all the time and even though I’m fairly skinny I have thyroid issues. Western standards say I’m ok but not Eastern standards. Within 6 months of taking thyroid pills a few years ago I got pregnant at age 38! Healthy baby boy now

I havent been diagnosed with any problems but I thought I may take to see if it helped my symptoms that are very similar to low thyroid, and it runs in my family. I took these for about two weeks and felt increasingly more exhausted, more depressed and downright ill.. May work for others, but I suggest checking with Dr first.

customer_reviews.title: USED FOR 6 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful when I read the reviews for this product. I was told I have a low thyroid t3 and needed to take Liothyronine, however I wanted to give supplements a try first. I took this for 6 months (I know these things take time), finished 3 bottles and started on a fourth. Unfortunately I did not see improvement in my lab results, and instead there was a decline; had to start taking the prescription medication. Although this might work for some, it did not work in my case.

customer_reviews.title: Feels great

This includes making lifestyle changes like being gluten free, good quality vitamin B complex n zinc, magnesium, Gaia Thyroid support, Brazil nut (2 nuts daily) and exercise. I believe this supplement helps but you need to do others things in addition to this to bring your levels in the normal range. Hope it helps someone.

customer_reviews.title: If you think your hormones are out of wack, try this.

Sometimes imbalances in our bodies are subclinical, meaning that your lab work and everything else will look normal but you know that something in your body is off. This thyroid support is definitely something that can make you feel like yourself again.

I gave this a try and it does seem to help a bit with my energy, but so far no great metabolism-boosting or weight loss effects. I'm seeing my endocrinologist soon and will let her know that I'm taking this in addition to my prescribed meds. I really want this to work... maybe it just takes time.

I finished the bottle hoping and waiting for any improvement as so many others stated they experienced. Unfortunately for me, I did not experience any real changes. No increased energy, no weight loss and I took this in addition to my prescribed medication. I really wanted this to work but for me it was just not happening.

It has been about 30 days and people say I look like I am less puffy and have not lost a lot of weight but some. I also purchased a bottle for my daughter who is borderline hypothyroid and she said she feels better as while. After reading an article about how people who have been on prescription thyroid med can build up an resistance to their med I believe that is true I was on prescription for 20 years and know I feel a lot better.

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Supplement Facts and ingredient amount!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I am rating it as 2 stars instead of 5 is because it shows under the supplement facts that the L-Tyrosine is 300 mg but you guys are actually selling 200 mg. Same goes for the Ashwagndha root extract, it states 120 mg and is actually only 80 mg. Please actually state the correct ingredients amounts for people. The product itself is good though, definitely 5 stars.

customer_reviews.text: I started taking this b/c my family has a history of thyroid issues. I've tried others but none work as well and are as gentle; I've had no adverse effects and it has helped to mitigate my energy loss and intermittent heart palpitations allowing me to have good days and nights.

customer_reviews.title: Helped my Mother
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my elderly Mother who was told by Doctors that her thyroid was off...and other than offering her more medications, they didn’t know what else to do. She declined because she didn’t want to start taking another medicine . She was lethargic and no desire to do anything. I sent these to her and she started taking them...she was feeling better within days with significantly more energy. She takes it regularly now because it makes her feel better. I don’t know how it works but it does. Worth a try for anyone looking for natural thyroid support. Aptly named by this reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

product_meta.title: Gaia Herbs, Thyroid Support, Ashwaganda, Bladderwrack, Coleus, Kelp, Schisandra, Vegan Liquid Phyto Capsules, 120 Count
product_meta.description: The health of the thyroid gland impacts how you feel on a daily basis. Because it helps regulate metabolism, every major system in the body is affected by altered levels of thyroid hormones. Gaia Herbs unique formula supports normal thyroid hormone production—helping you maintain optimal weight, neuromuscular tone, and cardiovascular health. Gaia Thyroid Support Liquid Phyto-Caps offer the power of a concentrated liquid extract in the convenience of a fast-dissolving capsule (Disintegrates within 10-12 minutes of ingestion). The liquid extract also allows for easy absorption in the body and is super-concentrated.
feature_bullets: PLANT BASED SUPPLEMENT: An herbal supplement used to support healthy metabolic balance. Thyroid Support is perfect for adults looking to regulate their thyroid hormones and feel their absolute best.
PROMOTES HEALTHY METABOLISM: Designed to support normal thyroid hormone production — helping you maintain optimal weight, neuromuscular tone, and cardiovascular health.
SYNERGISTIC HERBAL BLEND: Coleus forskholii and natural iodine from our proprietary kelp seaweed blend promotes a healthy metabolism while L-Tyrosine supports healthy levels of thyroid hormones.

MADE AT THE GAIA CERTIFIED ORGANIC FARM: We are committed to using only non-GMO ingredients. Our products are purity tested and do not contain gluten, soy, dairy, meat, peanuts, sesame, shellfish, yeast or eggs.
40 DAY SUPPLY: Includes 1 (120 Count) Gaia Herbs Thyroid Support Herbal Supplement. We suggest taking 2 capsules in the morning and 1 capsule in the evening between meals.
